items.sentence: Tom is the one who took care of my dog while I was in Australia.
The train arrived at the station thirty minutes behind schedule.
Even the most carefully made plans frequently result in failure.
Several handsome young men were talking to Mary and her friends.
Tom doesn't know the difference between murder and manslaughter.
The house across the street is going to be torn down next month.
Tom argued with Mary about how they should raise their children.
Tom told me that he doesn't care what other people think of him.
Instead of waiting for Tom any longer, let's go ahead and leave.
Tom installed security cameras on his property to deter thieves.
